Text.Page:
(You hear strange, mumbling voices, accompanied by the sound of flowing water.)

"No, please! Save us! Aren't we all brothers?"
"It was you who led us here...
...Yes, I finally understand...

...So this is the power of the Core..."

"Soon, I can leave...The chief guard...where is he...?"

(You hear a popping sound, and heavy splashing.)Touch the sphere.Carefully take your hand away.
